001package org.consensusj.jsonrpc.daemon;
002
003import org.consensusj.jsonrpc.introspection.AbstractJsonRpcService;
004import org.consensusj.jsonrpc.introspection.JsonRpcServiceWrapper;
005import org.slf4j.Logger;
006import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
007
008import jakarta.inject.Singleton;
009import java.lang.invoke.MethodHandles;
010import java.lang.reflect.Method;
011import java.util.Map;
012import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
013
014/**
015 * Simple Echo JSON-RPC Service
016 */
017@Singleton
018public class EchoJsonRpcService extends AbstractJsonRpcService {
019    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(EchoJsonRpcService.class);
020    private static final Map<String, Method> methods = JsonRpcServiceWrapper.reflect(MethodHandles.lookup().lookupClass());
021    private static final String helpString = """
022            echo message
023            help
024    """;
025
026    public EchoJsonRpcService() {
027        super(methods);
028    }
029
030    public CompletableFuture<String> echo(String message) {
031        log.debug("EchoJsonRpcService: echo {}", message);
032        return result(message);
033    }
034
035    public CompletableFuture<String> help() {
036        log.debug("EchoJsonRpcService: help");
037        return result(helpString);
038    }
039}
